page.title: 16Church and Chapel.
page.content: The church is 150 years old and was built in 1839. The village was called Burley Vill. The chapel was built in 1789. The first vicar was J.Craig. The church is a Victorian church with metal gratings on the floor and it has lancet windows. The tiles are called Victorian quarry tiles.The church has Victorian Gothic arches. The church is really a simple church and is only a rectangular shape.The church today is the same as built. They have built on a transcept and a gallery has been abandoned. The gallery was used for people to sit in.The font is made of marble and is the same age as the church .It is used for baptising people.There are about 208 seats for people in pews,which are quite modern. The pulpit is where the vicar speaks to the people.The church also has a sanctuary near the altar and a lectern
